thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Deutsche Bank to shift NY headquarters from Wall Street

title: Deutsche Bank to shift NY headquarters from Wall Street
text:
May 4, 2018 / 8:47 PM / in 40 minutes Deutsche Bank to shift NY headquarters from Wall Street Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 4 (Reuters) - Deutsche Bank AG said on Friday it will move its New York headquarters from Wall Street to a location midtown.
The bank will shift to 1 Columbus Circle from 60 Wall Street, according to an internal memo to employees.
The new location will consolidate its New York presence and would reduce its commercial presence in the city by 30 percent, the bank said. (Reporting by Diptendu Lahiri in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
